resources: Smart Power Control Have full control over your switchable network outlets. At the moment switchable network outlets from ANEL-Elektronik AG (www.anel-elektronik.de) are supported: NET-PwrCtrl HUT, NET-PwrCtrl IO, NET-PwrCtrl ADV, NET-PwrCtrl PRO, NET-PwrCtrl HOME New Power-Control scene Create a scene for your home screen Existing Power-Control scene Start an existing scene from your home screen Power-Control Outlet State Power-Control Group State What\'s New Edit network connections Delete Device Delete all devices Save Error reading configured devices Error sending inquiry packet to %1$s Error sending broadcast inquiry packet on port %d Device reports an error Invalid username / password combination Could not listen on port %d:\n (ports < 1024 only possible on rooted devices) No answer from the device %1$s. Last seen: %2$d seconds ago Test Name Hostname or IP UDP port for sending UDP port for receiving Username Password Add device… Add scene… Delete all Refresh New device Are you sure you really want to delete this device? Are you sure you want to delete all devices? All your outlets are out of range or associated with a group.\n\nSwipe left to configure new devices and swipe right to change the current group. There were no devices found by the automatic device search.\n\n Please double check that you are in the same network as your devices, UDP on the devices is activated and the network ports in the preferences are correct.\n\nAlternatively use the (+) icon located in the top-left bar to manually enter device data. Remove group Rename group Feedback Make favorite No favorite anymore A scene combines multiple actions. A scene can have a name and an icon. You may add a copy of a scene to your homescreen for fast access. If a scene is a favorite, it appears in the left navigation menu. Plugin not installed!
